anthropic_config.system: A single photograph of Galata Tower, Istanbul where the frame is divided into organic, flowing sections, each showing a different era: 1890s sepia Ottoman period, 1960s faded color, present day digital clarity. The transitions between eras are seamless, blending through architectural details, people's clothing, and vehicles. Same camera angle, same perspective, different times bleeding into each other. Street level view. Photorealistic for each era's authentic photography style.

variables.name: era1:1890s sepia Ottoman period
variables.description: Input for era1:1890s sepia Ottoman period

variables.name: era3:present day digital clarity
variables.description: Input for era3:present day digital clarity

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""A single photograph of Galata Tower, Istanbul where the frame is divided into organic, flowing secti...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
